The magic longbow is a longbow fletched from magic logs. It requires a Ranged level of 50 to wield and can fire arrows up to amethyst.

Players can make a magic longbow with a Fletching level of 85 by cutting an unstrung magic longbow from magic logs, granting 91.5 Fletching experience, and then stringing unstrung magic longbow with a bow string, granting a further 91.5 experience.

Fletching a magic longbow from magic logs and a bow string will profit 126 while fletching a magic longbow from a magic longbow (u) and a bow string will profit 127.

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player performing the magic longbow's special attack, Powershot.

The magic longbow's special attack, Powershot, is guaranteed to hit the target. This consumes 35% of the player's special attack energy. This special attack is also shared with the magic comp bow.

Damage inflicted by this special attack is unaffected by damage-boosting prayers (such as Eagle Eye) and the slayer helmet (i).

[[File:Magic longbow detail.png|left|110px]]
The '''magic longbow''' is a [[longbow (weapon)|longbow]] fletched from [[magic logs]]. It requires a [[Ranged]] level of 50 to wield and can fire [[arrows]] up to [[amethyst arrows|amethyst]].

Players can make a magic longbow with a [[Fletching]] level of 85 by cutting an [[Magic longbow (u)|unstrung magic longbow]] from [[magic logs]], granting 91.5 Fletching [[experience]], and then stringing unstrung magic longbow with a [[bow string]], granting a further 91.5 experience.

Fletching a magic longbow from [[magic logs]] and a [[bow string]] will profit {{Coins|{{GEP|Magic longbow}}-({{GEP|Magic logs}}+{{GEP|Bow string}})}} while fletching a magic longbow from a [[magic longbow (u)]] and a [[bow string]] will profit {{Coins|{{GEP|Magic longbow}}-({{GEP|Magic longbow (u)}}+{{GEP|Bow string}})}}.

==Special attack==
[[File:Powershot.gif|thumb|230px|A player performing the magic longbow's special attack, ''Powershot''.]]
The magic longbow's special attack, ''Powershot'', is [[Successful hit|guaranteed to hit]] the target. This consumes 35% of the player's special attack energy. This special attack is also shared with the [[magic comp bow]].

Damage inflicted by this special attack is unaffected by damage-boosting [[prayer]]s (such as [[Eagle Eye]]) and the [[slayer helmet (i)]].
